ModMetaData.name: Extra Alerts
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some useful alerts, with options to disable ones you don't want. Includes:
- Caravan paused and awaiting instructions
- Tainted clothing
- Human leather worn by pawn who doesn't like it
- Lovers not sharing a bed
- Non-lovers sharing a bed
- Aescetic has nice bedroom
- Bonded animal not assigned to bonded master
Safe to add and remove
